SUMMER INTERNSHIP PROJECT                                                                                                                            (2 Months) 
Company Name- Talent Corner HR Services          Designation- Intern                               Time Period- 20 May To 20 July 2024 
Job Role- Business Development Executive   
Responsibilities 
 Cold calling, Lead generation, Data research, Onboarding. 
 Conducted market research to identify potential leads and target audiences. 
 Engaged with prospective clients through cold calls, emails, and social linkedIn. 
 Collaborated with the marketing team to refine lead generation strategies. 
 Skilled in B2B sales, building strong relationships with clients and identifying new 
business opportunities. 
 Contributed to achieving targets by onboarding new clients. 
Achievements 
 Converted 6 high-quality leads, contributing to a total of 1.2 lakh rupees in sales. 
 Successfully completed the given Target of onboarding clients.
